items.name: Call of the Brotherhood
explicitMods: +15 to Intelligence
28% increased Lightning Damage
33% increased Mana Regeneration Rate
48% of Lightning Damage Converted to Cold Damage
Your spells have 100% chance to Shock against Frozen Enemies
flavourText: so that they may recognize each other
across any distance of time or travel.

items.name: Void Battery
explicitMods: 80% reduced Spell Damage
12% increased Cast Speed
57% increased Global Critical Strike Chance
+45 to maximum Mana
+1 to Maximum Power Charges
25% increased Spell Damage per Power Charge
flavourText: and to receive everything in return."

properties.name: Spell, Movement, Duration, Fire, Travel, Blink

socketedItems.secDescrText: Teleport to a location, damaging enemies and leaving a trail of burning ground in your wake. Shares a cooldown with other Blink skills.
explicitMods: Deals 1738.6 Base Fire Damage per second
Base duration is 4.00 seconds
Deals 659 to 988 Fire Damage
19% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Each supported spell will track how much mana you spend on it, granting a buff when the total mana spent reaches a threshold. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, mines or skills with a reservation.
explicitMods:
Gain Arcane Surge after Spending a total of 15 Mana on
Upfront Costs and Effects of a Supported Skill

Arcane Surge grants 10% increased Cast Speed
Arcane Surge grants 30% increased Mana Regeneration rate
Arcane Surge lasts 4 seconds
Supported Skills deal 10% more Spell Damage while you have Arcane Surge
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Surgebinders
implicitMods: Curse Enemies with Elemental Weakness on Hit
Attacks have +0.58% to Critical Strike Chance
explicitMods: 95% increased Armour and Evasion
6% increased Elemental Damage per Frenzy Charge
7% increased Physical Damage per Endurance Charge
5% increased Spell Damage per Power Charge
10% chance to Steal Power, Frenzy, and Endurance Charges on Hit

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any non-blessing skill with a reservation.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 24% increased Aura effect
Supported Skills Reserve Life instead of Mana
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Grants a buff providing fire damage based on your physical damage. While you have this buff, if you kill an enemy, other enemies near them will be burned based on the overkill damage. The burn inflicted by this skill can only be affected by modifiers to damage over time (burning damage is damage over time).
explicitMods: Base duration is 4.00 seconds
Base Burning Damage is 25% of Overkill Damage
38% more Burning Damage
Buff grants 15% of your Physical Damage as Extra Fire Damage
Buff grants 15% increased Fire Damage
Buff grants 12% more Spell Fire Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Each supported spell skill will track damage you take, and be triggered when the total damage taken reaches a threshold. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Vaal skills, channelling skills, and skills with a reservation cannot be triggered.
explicitMods: This Gem can only Support Skill Gems requiring Level 38 or lower
Supported Skills deal 65% less Damage
You cannot Cast Supported Triggerable Spells directly
Trigger Supported Spells when you take 528 total Damage from Hits
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Take less Physical and Elemental Damage for a short time. Consumes up to 5 Endurance Charges to lengthen the buff and further lessen Physical Damage taken. Shares a cooldown with other Guard skills.
explicitMods: Base duration is 1.00 seconds
20% increased Buff Duration per Endurance Charge removed
This Skill's Cooldown does not recover during its effect
26% less Elemental Damage taken
26% less Physical Damage taken
15.0% less Physical Damage taken per Endurance Charge removed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Heatshiver
enchantMods: Wrath has 30% increased Mana Reservation Efficiency
explicitMods: 86% increased Evasion Rating
60% increased Mana Regeneration Rate
+24% to Fire Resistance
+25% to Cold Resistance
Gain 1% of Cold Damage as Extra Fire Damage per 1% Chill Effect on Enemy
Gain 100% of Cold Damage as Extra Fire Damage against Frozen Enemies

items.name: Badge of the Brotherhood
explicitMods: Your Maximum Frenzy Charges is equal to your Maximum Power Charges
9% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate of Travel Skills per Frenzy Charge
8% increased Effect of Elusive on you per Power Charge
21% chance to lose a Frenzy Charge when you use a Travel Skill
23% chance to lose a Power Charge when you gain Elusive
flavourText: Greater than any blade, agility and intellect will be your weapons.
